Description: The following statement contains a magic number: var quotedString = configurator.CreateTerminal("\"(\\\\.|[^\"])*\""' f => f.Substring(1' f.Length - 2));

The following statement contains a magic number: elementList.AddProduction(elementList' "'"' element)               .SetReduceFunction(f =>               {                   var list = (List<JsonElement>)f[0];                   list.Add((JsonElement)f[2]);                   return list;               });

The following statement contains a magic number: element.AddProduction(quotedString' ":"' value)                                        .SetReduceFunction(f => new JsonElement { Name = (string)f[0]' Value = f[2] });

The following statement contains a magic number: valueList.AddProduction(valueList' "'"' value)                   .SetReduceFunction(f =>                   {                       var list = (List<object>)f[0];                       list.Add(f[2]);                       return list;                   });
